players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Look out for Bob, as he might be my partner."

Bob: "Charlie was a good guy, and I'm glad you came clean Alice. Diana, are you sure you didn't see anything suspicious last night? I think we should work together to figure out who the real Mafioso is."

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Look out for Bob, as he might be my partner."

You: "Charlie was a good guy, and I'm glad you came clean Alice. Diana, are you sure you didn't see anything suspicious last night? I think we should work together to figure out who the real Mafioso is."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
